channel.title: Minecraft Status List
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I've just launched a server list for Minecraft that allows you share your server, like on the Minecraft website. This list however, includes features to help filter your results and pin-point exactly the kind of server you want to play on.
Not only can you check uptime (what % of the time a server is up) but you can also check out graphs to see what time of day the server is up too!
If you only want to play survival servers or servers based in the victorian era, you can find them too with clear markings for each.
Check it out,
http://minecraft.prinsig.com
Thanks,
Syrillia

item.title: Minecraft Status List
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

This is true, but I wanted to launch my own.
